name: SilverBullet (Bullet Hell!)
description:
Press space, or left or right mouse button to make silver bullets! You can also move around using arrow keys!

This game doesn't really have a goal in particular, although I can use the mechanics for a future game! :D

This game was also using Godot, so thanks, Godot tutorials!

Credits: I made all the visual assets (it is the tile.png from my other game) and the background music, Synzorasize - Synchronized! :D The shooting sound came from soundbible.com!
